issue.title: [CI][GLib] Failed on macOS
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5623](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5623). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/546495122#L3941

```

arrow-glib/meson.build:225:0: ERROR: gobject-introspection dependency was not found, gir cannot be generated.
```

comments.body:
